definition[0]: if a road, passage, railway etc branches off from another road etc, it separates from it and goes in a different direction
example[0]: a passage branching off from the main tunnel
example[1]: We branched off from the main road and turned down a country lane.
definition[2]: to start talking about something different from what you were talking about before
example[2]: Then the conversation branched off into a discussion about movies.
